protein.general_function: Involved in guanyl-nucleotide exchange factor activity
protein.specific_function: Guanine nucleotide exchange factor (GEF) for KRAS, HRAS, and NRAS (in vitro). Plays a role in cell migration

go_class.description: regulation of small gtpase mediated signal transduction
